label.description: label for this job board, e.g. Super grads

domain.description: e.g. www.jobboard.com - used for source tracking

defaultAdDuration.description: how many days do ads remain up on the site, e.g. 30

commonFieldsList.description: the common fields that the job board wants to use

defaultLegacySourceCode.description: a default for legacy source code when this board is installed, e.g. SEEK.

defaultSetupErrorMessage.description: a default value for the installed board's setup error message. If not null, setup required will light up on the app for all new installs.
